attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It’s a horrible app, it’s too slow and it was saying racist slurs on the app. I am a white woman name Karen and I would like to speak to the manager. Do not download this.

attributes.title: Creepy
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it wanted to send me notifications and then he wanted my number😰 I know he likes kids but I don’t like him HORRIBLE APP!!

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: this doodoo head 💩 thinks that this app is good 🤮 i’ve seen 2 year olds design stuff better than this 👍🏼i think the tan got to his mini sized golf brain ✨prob playing too much mini golf 👑 the app doesn’t even work 😡 there’s no button that says “make trump out of office” 👺 so what’s the point of this app then ❤️

🥰💋Me and this app have a relationship.🥰💋 BUT IT BROKE UP WITH ME 2 WEEKS AGO 🤩❤️ idk what to do, I’m heart broken! And This app also distracted a driver and it ran into a rainbow 🌈❤️🤩 and the driver 🎊🎶evaporated🎶🎊 So this app gets 1 star from me ❤️🤩🌈❤️

attributes.title: this all causes death
attributes.review: my friend who is a trump supporter got this app the other day and the next day her mom told me she died 😔 so don’t get the trump app instead all you trump supporters should drink some water ✨💖🧚‍♂️ but make it bleach (but not actually because you might actually listen and accidentally kill your self)
